notice.ch: A班：限學號後二碼除以3餘數1者等同學選修

remark.ch: A班：限學號後二碼除以3餘數1者等同學選修

goal.ch: 學習工程分析所需要的基本數學原理與分析方法。
goal.en: To understand the mathematics of engineering analysis

outline.ch:
1. 向量微分
2. 向量積分
3. 向量空間
4. 矩陣與線性系統
5. 特徵值與特徵向量
outline.en:
1. Vector differential
2. Vector points
3. Vector space
4. Matrices and linear systems
5. Eigenvalues ??and eigenvectors

gradMethod.ch:
期中及期末考(70%)
作業及隨堂考(30%)

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限二年級。指定課程:必須先修MA1004。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
系所:限土木工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須先修MA1004。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
系所:限工學院學士班。指定課程:必須先修MA1004。且檢定指定課程平均成績達50分以上。
en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementMA1004 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.

Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementMA1004 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Engineering only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementMA1004 only.With an average of 50 or above for Required Subjects.
